protocol.text: Normalised using GCRMA ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 GC-RMA signal

After 3 weeks of growth in mild photorespiratory-promoting conditions, leaf tissue from the three different genotypes was harvested in triplicate. Design: 3 replicates x 3 genotypes (cat2, cat2 rbohD and cat2 rbohF)

Plants were grown in air from seeds under a 16 h/8 h day/night regime, relative humidity was 65%, and an irradiance of 200 μmol·m-2·s-1 was used to drive oxidative stress in the cat2 background plants. Arabidopsis Col-0, cat2, cat2 rbohD and cat2 rbohF were 3 week old before sampling.
Three biological replicates were generated each consisting of a pool of leaves from at least 8 plants. Total RNA was isolated using Trizol Reagent (Life Technologies, Gaithersburg, USA).
Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 5 microg total RNA.
Following fragmentation, 10 microg of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C and at 60 rounds/min. The GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400 and 450.
GeneChips were scanned using the GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.
